Key:
(Ever since then, we stopped using the words, "because
we're dating".)

(Just because two people are going out doesn't mean
you have to do anything. That's obvious. But it's also
not a reason to do nothing.)

(If we want to do something, we'll do it. If not, we
won't. We just won't force it. And we won't be tied
down to any labels.)

(We talked about it. And as we'd suggested, we were
spending the days slowly and calmly.)
Shido-kun, you sure are patient.
What are you talking about?

(Yoshino had visited me after school again today. Of
course Yoshinon would be with us.)
Because you're a young boy, Shido-kun. Aren't\nthere a bunch of things you wanted to do once you\ngot a girlfriend?
You can do whatever you want...?
Seeeee. She said you can do whatever you wannnnt.\nYou sly dog, you.

It's true that I imagined wanting to do a lot of
things once I had a girlfriend.
But it doesn't have to be right now.
Why not...?
That doesn't mean that you don't care about Yoshino,\nright?

Of course. I told you already, it doesn't have to be
now. It can be eventually.
Eventually, huh...?

Yeah, eventually is eventually. Yoshino, you'll always
be with me, so I'm sure such time will come. I'm fine
with waiting until then.
Gosh, that sure does sound like a long time. Well, I\nguess Yoshino says she doesn't mind.
But if you can't take it anymore, or if you can't\nhold yourself back, Shido-kun... I think you can do\nwhatever you want.
...Yes. I'm ready... emotionally.
...I want to think that I wouldn't lose control.

(To have her say this much... I don't know what to
do.)

So what do you want to do today? You want to read
books like the other day?
Hahaha. A joint activity to feel each other's love～

(Yoshino isn't good at flipping the pages because
Yoshinon's there.)

(So I always flip the page for Yoshino so that she can
see while leaning on me.)
U-Um... Today... Um... I brought something.
(Yoshino brought something big today.)
What did you bring today?
Hehehe. What do you think it is? It's light for its\nsize. It's soft and feels really good! What is it?!
Huh...? I have no idea...
U-Um... It's this.
Plushies...?
Y-Yes... It took some time, but... I made them.
Wow. They're all really good.

(All the plushies that Yoshino took out seemed to
be made with care.)
Hm...? This plushie... I feel like I've seen it before.
U-Um... This is you... Shido-san... And this... is me.
Ahhh. She made you pretty handsome. Then it can stand\nnext to Yoshinon.

Y-Yeah, right. I think it's really well-made. Yoshino,
you're good at making these, aren't you?

Y-Yes... Well, I don't know... if I'm good at it,
but... I like making these kinds of things...

It looks like something you'd buy from a store... No,
even better.

(I took the plushie that looked like me and examined
it. It really was well put together.)

Hahaha. But knowing you made and kept a plushie that
looks like me makes me blush a bit.

I-I'm sorry... For making it without asking
permission...

Oh, I'm not mad. It doesn't upset me. It's just... You
know, I feel self-conscious about it.
Right? Whenever she couldn't see you, Shido-kun,\nshe'd look at it and hug it to hide the sorrow...\nCan you imagine it? Can you imagine her doing it?

Shut up! If you do that, you'll make me think about
it.
I-I'm sorry... Um.

Yeah, well like I said, I don't mind. It's nothing you
need to worry about, Yoshino.
...Thank you.

If you feel lonely, Yoshino, I would like to be by
your side.
I'm okay. I know that it's me acting spoiled...
Shido-kun. We know you have your own life, too.\nOf course Yoshino doesn't want to get in your way.

You say that, but Yoshino, you can afford to be more
spoiled if you wanted.

Th-Then... Um, is it okay if I continue to... take
good care of your plushie?
I would never say no.
Aren't you glad, Yoshino? I mean, all this time,\nyou've sat it at the dinner table, slept with it, and\neven bathed with it.
...You can get it wet?

U-Um... I have to hand wash it, but... Are you sure I
can keep it?"	
Message	Yoshinon	"Why not? Shido-kun said you can. Why don't you\nleave the plushie of you with Shido-kun, then?
Hahaha. That might be a good idea.
Totally. I'm sure if Shido-kun goes to sleep with it,\nhe can feel you always by his side.

...It's nice that I'll be with Yoshino, but I kind of
feel embarrassed sleeping with a plushie at this age.
...Oh, but I think it's cute.

(It's nice that Yoshino's happy, but I honestly can't
be happy being called "cute" at this age.)

(And before I knew it, Yoshino picked up the plushie
that looked like herself and held it out toward me.)
Seeing you like that is interesting.
Interesting?

Yeah. Seeing the plushie Yoshino and Yoshinon next
to one another... It kinda feels like they're friends.
Then I guess Shido-kun is also part of the club?

Huh? Oh... Yeah, I guess that would make me part of
it.
(I tried moving the plushie that I had in hand.)

(Yoshino matched my moves and moved her plushie
along with mine.)
...Hello, Shido...san.
Y-Yeah. Hello.

(Yoshino made the plushie bow, and I did so too, but
I couldn't help but bow with it.)

Hehe... This really is... interesting. Shido-san,
you're playing with the plushie I made... It's kinda...
cute.

...I think the plushie would be happier to be called
"cute" rather than me.
Yoshino is taking good care of it on the daily, so I'm\nsure it's sick of being called cute.
...Are you always with it?

N-No, that's not true... I-I just... keep it near me
and sleep with it whenever I can't see you, if I'm
feeling lonely.

(As she said that, Yoshino made the plushie take
action as if to say, "You caught me".)
I see. So you're sleeping with Yoshino, huh...
Shido-kun. If you're jealous, you can say so.
It's true. I am kind of jealous.
You hear that, Yoshino? Shido said he wants to sleep\nwith you in his arms!

...Then... is it okay if I... spend the night sometime
soon?
Y-Yeah sure.

(Having an embarrassing conversation like this through
the plushie somehow makes it bearable.)
But aren't you lucky that you get to sleep using\nYoshino as a body pillow? It's a rare thing, being able\nto do that.
Yeah―
―And besides, if you sleep like that, who knows?\nYour hand may accidentally touch things, right?

U-Um... I may not have the best sleeping posture,
so... If that happens, I'm sorry...
Don't worry. It's hard to wake me.
Oh, really...?

Yeah. Because I don't wake up easily, Kotori will
dance on top of me.
Hmmm. So to put it frankly, once you fall asleep, if\nwe don't step on you, you won't wake up?

Wait. That was just an example. I do wake up at times
too, you know.
Th-Then I'll try my best...!

(What is she going to try her best at...? Besides, if
Yoshino spends the night and I'm able to hold her...
Would I be able to fall asleep normally?)

(Honestly, if such thing happens, I feel like I'll be
so nervous that I won't be able to sleep at all.)
Shido-kun, I can read you like a book. Why are you\ngetting so nervous now?

Well, we're talking about Yoshino coming over to spend
the night. Of course I'd get nervous.

But even then, even if Yoshino did come sleep over,
I'm sure she'd be sleeping in the guest room.
...Um, I won't be able to sleep next to you?

Well, Kotori's in the house, so I don't think she'd
let that happen.
At the end of the day, you're always listening to\nKotori-chan, aren't you?

Contrary to her attitude sometimes, she's still my
little sister.

...I'm envious... that she can always be with you. If
only... I were your little sister too...
But I wouldn't like that.
Hmmm? What do you mean by that, Shido-kun?\nYou're saying that you don't want to be with Yoshino\nand Yoshinon?! That's messed up! So mean!

That's not what I mean. If Yoshino's my little sister,
then I can't have her as my girlfriend right?
Oh...?! That's right...!

Yup. And besides, we may not be together now, but
I'll try my best so that we can be together someday.
But currently, you're going to look out for your\nlittle sister and won't use Yoshino as your body\npillow, right?
Yoshinon...

Shido-san... You're so nice to... everyone, aren't
you?
You think so?
Yeahhhh. I mean, that's what's great about you and\nall, but if you're too nice, Yoshino gets worried.\nDon't you understand a girl's heart?
...Did I worry you?

Um... It's not your fault, Shido-san. It's just that I
just get worried sometimes...

But really, it's just me. It's nice to be kind.. It's
not okay... for me to worry about that...

Although I trust... that you would never betray me...
There are times where I want you all to myself...
I'm sorry...

It's nothing to apologize for. I'll be more careful,
too.

(Yoshino is a good girl, and is always looking out for
me. That's why I'm sort of relieved that something
like this worries her.)

It's just that it's hard for me to suddenly stop being
like that.

No... Please, don't stop... If you suddenly become
mean to others... that'll make me even more sad.
So―
So in the end, Yoshino is just being spoiled, huh?\nTypical guy. You have to take responsibility now.
Of course I'll take responsibility.
Whoa... Shido-kun, you can be so bold!

(So they say, but I was able to say that because I was
using the plushie to talk.)

(If it were me, then I'd be so embarrassed. I wouldn't
be able to say something like that.)
Sh-Shido-san... Um...
Hm? Yoshino... What's―
Oh...
...I love you.
...Me, too.
...Please continue to be with me.
Of course.
(And so...)
(Not just the plushie but... we too got closer.)

(Let's continue... to be together. With this feeling
in our hearts.)
